nodes.title: How to Write a Cover Letter
nodes.excerpt: Overview In many job applications, you might have noticed that hiring managers or recruiters often ask for a cover letter. Whether they…
nodes.description: Resume is only sufficient to get the interview call or we should complement that with any other document, well the cover letter could do the job for you. Lets see what is cover letter and how it could improve the chances of landing an interiew call.

nodes.description: STAR methodoloy stands for Situation, Task, Action and Result. This helps in structure your responces in interviews, how to give a complete picture about the solution.

nodes.title: Attention Please!
nodes.excerpt:
Overview This article would discuss the following concepts

Basic intuation of attention model Mathematics behind the attention model Imple…
nodes.description: Attention in machine learning is like the brain's spotlight, highlighting important parts of data. Introduced in 2014, it focuses on relevant information using "queries," "keys," and "values." Imagine a model yelling, "Hey, brain, remember that detail!" to handle complex tasks like translating long sentences.
